transcript: if I have 365 days a year what are my bottom 10% days going to look like probably pretty shitty how many of those a year do I get 36 well there's 12 months in a year okay well I'm getting three of those a month that's actually like fairly common it's every 10 days I have a bottom 10% day and so I think about that a lot where I'm like I don't necessarily need to change anything I think my plan's fine I just need to increase my tolerance for the fact that what bottom 10% days look like
